pages.text: Carrying around enough $(l:magic/ink)Ink$() with you to maintain your magical equipment has become both a chore and a space hog in your inventory.$(br)Now that you're familiar with $(l:magic/ink)Ink$(), it's time for a new creation: the Pigment Palette.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Capable of storing sizable amounts of $(l:magic/ink)Ink$(), making you able to supply all your magical equipment. It is not suited for powering your machines, though.$(br)$(italic)Now you are a true Artist of Color.
